name: With Your Powers Combined Quiz | Comic Characters Mixed | 10 Questions

questions.text: Group members included, Wheeler, Kwame, Gi, Link and Ma-Ti. This hero team was made up of teenagers from all over the world. What superhero team is this?
questions.explanation:
The Planeteers.

	"Captain Planet and the Planeteers" was a short lived comic book that was produced in conjunction with the the long-running television show. The comic series, published by Marvel Comics, only lasted twelve issues.

questions.text: Known as "teenagers with attitude," this group of six high school students used coins as the source of their powers and sometimes drove giant robots. What superhero team is this?
questions.explanation:
The Power Rangers.

	The "Mighty Morphin Power Rangers" television show was spun into comics several times. Hamilton Comics, Marvel Comics and Paper Kutz have all released various editions between 1994 and 2015.

questions.text: Based in Manhattan, this team has four members that are all named after artists What superhero team is this?
questions.explanation:
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles.

	Created in 1984 by Kevin Eastman and Peter Laird, the ninja turtles were actually a riff on another comic book, "Daredevil". The joke was that when the toxic ooze hit Matt Murdock in his comic, some slipped down into the sewer and covered a few turtles. That joke went on to make hundreds of millions of dollars across all media platforms.

questions.text: From Wildstorm/DC comics, this team consists of members such as Sarah Rainmaker, Caitlin Fairchild and Roxanne Spaulding. What superhero team is this?
questions.explanation:
Gen¹³.

	An animated movie was produced by Disney, but never released in America because DC comics bought out Wildstorm Comics. Disney and Time Warner (the owners of DC Comics) were competitors, so the decision to stop the release was made. Wildstorm produced the first limited run of the Gen¹³ books before being taken over by DC, where the team gained popularity with larger print runs.

questions.text: Based mostly in Canada, this team consists of Northstar, Puck, Sasquatch, Shaman, Snowbird and Vindicator to name a few. What superhero team is this?
options: Captain Canada and his Super Friends
questions.explanation:
Alpha Flight.

	Created by John Byrne, initially as just a mention to fill out the past of Wolverine for an "X-Men" story he was writing. The team then spun out into its own book that ran more than 130 issues.

questions.text: Created by Jack Kirby for DC Comics, this team consisted of Ace, Red, Prof. and Rocky. What superhero team is this?
questions.explanation:
Challengers of the Unknown.

	The team is made up of people that just happened to be on an airplane together when it crashed. The four survived the crash and became the Challengers of the Unknown as they defied the odds over and over and kept skirting death.

questions.text: Consisting of a group of sidekicks and lesser known characters, once teamed up, Red Robin, Wonder Girl, Raven and Beast Boy help to form what team?
questions.explanation:
Teen Titans.

	While the roster changes a lot from era to era, the one thing that stays consistent is that Robin is the leader. Robin, Batman's former sidekick, sometimes is known as Nightwing or Red Robin depending on what is going on in the greater DC Universe at the time. Two animated TV series and a few movies have been produced about this team as well as more than 300 comic books.

questions.text: Starlord, Gamora, Groot and Drax are among the characters in this comic. What superhero team is this?
questions.explanation:
Guardians of the Galaxy.

	The film adaptation of this comic was one of the largest grossing films of 2014. None of the characters listed in the question were the founding members of the team, but they are among the most famous. When the team was initially created it was made up of, Major Victory, Talon, YellowJacket, Yondu, Replica, Firelord, Nikki, Aleta Ogord, Charlie 27, Starhawk and Martinex.

questions.text: Emma Frost, Jubilee, Gaia, Banshee and Husk were among the founding members which super-powered team?
questions.explanation:
Generation X.

	Frost, Jubilee and Banshee have all also been members of the X-Men, the key clue was "founding member" in the question. Scott Lobdell and Chris Bachalo created the team, which first appeared in "Uncanny X-Men #318" before spinning out into it's own comic and eventually having a made for TV movie released.

questions.text: Wildwing Flashblade, Nosedive Flashblade, Mallory Mallard and Duke L'Orange were among the members of which super team?
questions.explanation:
The Mighty Ducks.

	Only a handful of comics were produced based on the Disney Channel animated TV show. The comics were all number #1, and had various titles on them. A series of comic strips featuring the characters appeared sporadically in the "Disney Adventures" magazine in the 1990s.
